The purpose of this application development is to prevent as much as possible the consumption of system resources by the infrequent APPs. The commonly used APPs do not interfere in any way. Otherwise, they may cause problems in use, waste a lot of time and effort, and even affect their own lives. The effect (except for friends who are willing to take the initiative to solve the problem), so you do not need to use all the features. \n\nThe new version provides some additional minor features for the Play version and donated friends. If you have already donated, go to \'Donate\' and check \'I have donated\'. Play Edition does not require this setting to use all features.

The default mechanism is that applications that have been previously authenticated need to be revalidated when the screen goes out and re-lit. If this option is enabled, it will need to be verified each time.
Some settings need a reboot to take effect.
Turn on/off need restart your phone
Gaussian blur to the recent task card. may affects system performance.
Blur all tasks if turned on, otherwise only blur those need authentication.
allow to use third party verifiers

Third-party password validators will be allowed, you can choose one to use.\nSeveral styles of validators are available to choose from Coolapk.\nYou can also develop any custom style validators yourself. For specific development documentation, please refer to the source code.
The service is not connected and the settings will not take effect.
Can not Hook home, function unavailable
Prevents adb/installer from uninstalling/clearing-data protected apps, and if you want to uninstall/clear-data for X-APM, this feature must be disabled first.
The following applications need to be authenticated by password when it is started.

"The following applications are blocked from running after phone booting.\n\nNote that, although certain applications are blocked from starting up while booting, they may still be started by other applications/broadcasts later. If you want to disable this, please set the auto start too."

"The following applications will be cleared when they are clicked to clear immediately or after the screen is locked. To enhance the user experience, any interaction with the device during the lock screen cleanup process interrupts the cleanup process.

Note that in order to prevent missing important notifications, applications that have notification messages are skipped by default when clearing the selected application. You can change this setting in the General Settings."

Why are some application lock screens not cleaned? Please check if the protection notification application setting is turned on or if the setting to protect an application with audio focus is turned on.
"The following applications will be cleared after quited via the back button."
"The following applications will be cleared after removed from the recent tasks."

"The following applications are prohibited from being launched by other applications (via service or broadcast). (WeChat and Alipay are not recommended to add, otherwise you may fail initiating a payment; neither the input method app, otherwise it may not be able to evoke the input)."

1. You need to activate the X-APM module in the Xposed installer and reboot phone to use the following features.\nThe Xposed installer needs to receive broadcasts to get module update notifications. If it doesn\'t, make sure you don\'t have any restrictions on the Xposed installer , and try to recheck the module and reboot.
After X-APM module is updated, you need to restart the device. Otherwise, system may not work properly.
Redemption mode has been exited and the restart takes effect.
This function is currently unstable, some applications may not be applicable, if you find a problem please turn off this option.
Recommended to turn on for security
Unable to show internal verification window
Blocked %1$s times. Permitted %2$s times.\nRecently start attempt at %3$s, type %4$s, result %5$s, reason %6$s, launched by %7$s.

I have spent a lot time on this project, so do you want to pay for me?\nif you already donated, don\'t need donate again, The service don\'t have record of donation :( Please turn on the donation button above, thank you very much for your support.

Disable or enable components of a application, components disabled will not be launched, you can modify whether to allow it to reactivate itself in settings.\n\nNote that disabling its components may cause the application to run abnormally (FC).
Will change screen unlocking settings at the same time
Will change screen unlocking settings at the same time
Some apps will automatically re-enable their own disabled components. Turn this option on to block this behavior.
Increasing the radius parameter of the blur algorithm can reduce its processing time and resource cost, but will cause the generated image to become more blurred too.
Do nothing to system applications. Each list does not show any system applications.

Because of the feedback from users, many of them are caused by the application being killed, causing some usage problems. Therefore, from this version, our [Limited] part was changed from the previous whitelist mode to the blacklist mode. You may need to go to the settings below to reconfigure.

Note that this feature is still in the experimental stage!!!If you have a bug, don't try it.

Non-LOS-based ROM, the network control settings modification cannot take effect until the device is completely restarted.

Apps with the same UID share the same settings.

Don\'t cleaned up applications that get audio focus(MUSIC/MOVIE/SPEECH), such as NetEase cloud music that is playing music.\n Note that some applications that are not designed according to the specification may still hold the audio focus after stopping playback.

Activity Redirect can help you get rid of the annoying app ads splash screen, the principle is to replace its advertising splash screen Activity (A) for its real home page Activity (B). 

developers have been pre-configuring a few demonstration rules for you. 

You can add the corresponding replacement rule by clicking the below "+" button, you can open More - Developer Tools - Show current activity to observe or copy the specific name of the current Activity, add it to your rules. 

 Tip: You can copy Activity A frist, fill in the blanks at Activity B, save, and edit Activity B at later.
The replaced activity (A) can not be empty
The replaced activity (A) name is invalid, please check the input.
Will be replaced with an empty Activity, maybe cause the replaced Activity can not start, it does not matter, this is also a solution
The configuration obtained from the remote server is empty.

Currently in %1$s mode. You can set the control mode for the restricted part (self-start, association start, lock screen clean, etc.) to whitelist mode (allow applications that you are selected), or blacklist mode (prohibit applications that you are selected).
New rules are copied by you
I have detected a new rule available in your clipboard. Do you want to import this rule?
To automatically configure the app for a new installation app, click on Settings Template.
Disabling certain permissions for an app may cause the app to run abnormally; disabling certain system app permissions may result in the device not working properly or not boot.
Display the current Activity with Toast way.

Android Id is a string of random characters used to indicate the identity of the Android system. It is randomly generated by the system when it is first initialized, and stored in the Secure Settings. Any application that has the possibility to read the character will distinguish your device.

when application that enabled Fake identity tries to read the Android ID、Device ICC number, and device serial number, uses the value set by the user to replace the original value of the current device (does not change the original value of the current device). \n\n Tip: Try not to use it for common social apps, otherwise it may cause account login exception.
View apps with Fake identity settings

The greening function is implemented based on the authority control and shares the same switch. 

You can find the application you want to green from the list, carry out the greening, greening can prohibit the application to start the service / wake up the device / set the timer. 

 By default, application management does not make any changes to the application. Checking the box indicates that the application is allowed to start. The application installed by the greening user may cause the application to fail to run normally. The application of the greening system may cause the device to fail to operate normally or even Start, please be careful! 

 Tip: You can also go to the rights management and follow (the service/timer/wake-up lock) to control these behaviors according to your own ideas.
Clear all settings data for X-APM, including all lists and switches. \nNote: If you cannot recover, manually delete the data/system/tor directory.
The default settings for application management have been restored for you.
Unable to delete data, please delete it manually! ! !
Unable to start the setup, please check the module activation status.

This is a statement that I have to write, please read it carefully. 

1. Regarding application management data, in order to achieve boot-up and boot-up restrictions, we must store some data in a certain directory of the system. We provide the function of deleting data. If you mind, please quit! 

2. Regarding memory usage, application management itself does not need to run in the background, you can kill at any time. The front desk runs to occupy part of the running memory, if you mind please quit! 

3. Regarding stability, there are many ROMs, and your device may not be compatible. It will cause some problems in use. If you mind, please quit! 

4. Regarding the bug, I am very grateful to all my friends for their bug feedback. I will use my free time for maintenance. 

The advanced functions provided by this program, such as component editing, greening, etc., improper use may cause the application to flash back, etc. Please carefully read the instructions before use. 

 Finally, thank you for your support and understanding!!!
When an application crashes abnormally, a detailed error stack is displayed.

The application in the Smart mode is unrestricted when running in the foreground. When the application returns to the background for 3 seconds, the service is actively stopped (if the FCM/GCM message is received during the period, it will remain for half a minute). \n\nNote that this mode conflicts with Greening. If you green the service for the application, then the application in the foreground still can\'t start any service.
Long press the back button to kill the current application
Will be executed in the selected order
Invalid if the app redefines a long press event.
Theme settings will take effect the next time you enter the app
What\'s the difference between this and Play version?

Starting from version 3.0.6, in order to improve compatibility and applicability, the content provider is no longer used for data communication in the pad. if you have just finished upgrading from the version before version 3.0.6, click the import button to import it into the current database.
Back up X-APM data such as function switches and lists for application management.
Choose a backup file to restore, need reboot.

This function can prompt the system to enter the Doze mode as soon as possible when the device screen is off and not in the state of charge, in order to reduce the power consumption as much as possible. \n\nNote that some users and devices interacting with the screen or charging will interrupt the urging and Doze process, and during the Doze and Doze period, some functions of the device may be temporarily unavailable. Please understand in advance what is Doze mode before use.
After the last time screen was closed, the time that X-APM urged the system to enter Doze mode was %1$s, and the duration of this Doze was %2$s, click to view the earlier record. \n
After the screen is turned off, the delay of urging the system to enter the Doze mode is %1$s, the time should not be too short, and the best experience is more than 5 minutes.
Delay time must be greater than 0
Input characters are illegal, please check
Lock screen cleanup is not applied to applications with notification messages.
Applications that have notification messages are not processed.
When the app is crossed out from the recent task card, the app needs to be re-verified the next time it is launched.
re-verify when recent task card crossed out
Failure reason %1$s\nThe last state when device attempt to enter the Doze state is %2$s
The device is in an interactive state
Still can\'t enter Doze after trying many times.

The menu here contains the FAQ, as well as the update log, so be sure to read it before using it.
Click here to turn this feature on/off
Click here to filter the contents of the list below

During the process of Oreo adaptation, due to changes in the policy of selinux on Oreo, the previous binder communication scheme was not applicable to Oreo version. therefore, we injected the binder service managed by the application as a TV service. if you are not clear about what is said above, it doesn\'t matter as long as the following two points are made clear: \ n1. this application is in version 8.0 and above, and is not applicable to Android TV equipment ( the current equipment is TV equipment). \ N2. if other module authors also use this TV injection method ( unlikely, there may be a better injection method, usually the author will inform them), then only one of the two modules will work normally.

During the process of Oreo adaptation, due to changes in the policy of selinux on Oreo, the previous binder communication scheme was not applicable to Oreo version. therefore, we injected the binder service managed by the application as a TV service. if you are not clear about what is said above, it doesn\'t matter as long as the following two points are made clear: \n1. this application is in version 8.0 and above and is not applicable to Android TV ( current device is not a TV device ). \n2. if other module authors also use this TV injection method ( unlikely, there may be a better injection method, usually the author will inform them ), then only one of the two modules will work normally.

The first-time dialog cannot be displayed, you can continue to use it, your system may not be compatible with the latest Android Support library, please feedback to the author or device publisher, this problem is very disgusting.
Temporarily hide the card, go to the universal settings to show it again.
The module has been activated, Module status %1$s，System status %2$s。
In case of failure, please report the log according to the novice manual, or continue to use it regardless of these faults.

Abnormal, detected that your system has experienced a failure, may have experienced an abnormal restart, crash, although uncertain is not caused by X-APM, it is still strongly recommended to report log to help developers improve application stability and compatibility, you You can also go to the toolbox to clear these error logs.
Oops, I can\'t get the activity, I can\'t display the dialog box.
Lock screen cleaning is not enabled

Create a desktop shortcut to launch the app quickly. Some desktops may not be able to generate shortcuts due to compatibility issues, and the author will adapt as much as possible. If it cannot be generated, you can run it from the Run button on the right side of the list.
If thawed and entered by a shortcut, refreeze when the screen is closed and the app is not in the foreground
Re-freeze when the app is crossed out from the most recent mission
Unable to launch the app, probably because the app has no user interface
Empty, if the system application cannot read, please make sure the General Settings - Exclude System Application switch is off.

In order to reduce the impact of this application on the system as much as possible, the permission management setting value will not be consistent with the system\'s own app OPS service setting value. when a certain permission is applied, if it is rejected here in application management, then this permission application will be rejected. if it is allowed here in application management, the system will continue to check the ops service setting ( default permission management above 4.4). When you clear this application data, there will be no legacy issues with permission management settings.
Uninstall this app and help you clean up any residual data.

Some user feedback lock screen cleaning is invalid, especially for this description, please read to avoid unnecessary use errors. \n In order to minimize the unnecessary impact on the user by killing the application, the application without notification is not cleaned by default, and can be set. In addition, after the screen is locked, if the screen is opened immediately and the cleaning process is not completed, in order to reduce the system service jam caused by the cleaning, and you may want to continue to use the application that has just been cleaned, we will terminate the cleaning process. Therefore, we will do the cleaning operation when you lock the screen and are not using the device. Please know, thank you for reading.
It important to read the novice tutorial in the upper right corner of the homepage before the novice can use it. If you have any problems, please check the tutorial first.
In order to achieve some functions, we will store some data in a certain directory of the system (data/system/tor), don\'t worry, we provide the function of deleting data.
Regarding memory usage, X-APM itself does not need to run in the background, you can kill at any time.
There are many ROMs, and your device may not be compatible with some functions, which may cause some problems in use.
The advanced features provided by the program, such as component editing, greening, etc., may cause the application to crash when used improperly.
Greening/General permissions can be configured here.
Maximize avoid the application process to be killed by the Low memory killer, resident memory.

When the power button is pressed several times in a short time, locks the screen, and when you unlock, you need to enter a password (or draw an unlock pattern, depending on your settings), and you must not use the fingerprint to unlock. Generally used in emergencies. \n Some custom ROMs may not be supported (ZUI2.5 is not supported at this time), or the usage experience is very bad (some ROMs may have customized double-click power button events, such as launching the camera).
The system application does not allow this shortcut setting. Please go to the corresponding function area and set it carefully.
Please carefully set the system application

X-APM is now in self-help mode and all features have been disabled. Due to a fatal error during the last device boot, the device does not start properly, so X-APM enters this mode to ensure that all system level hook are turned off (although this error is not necessarily caused by application management!), please see the novice manual. Learn more, or simply click the button to exit the mode (restart is in effect).

Minimize the consumption of X-APM\'s system resources and power, and close the associated startup record permission access record. It is recommended that if you feel that the power consumption is abnormal, you can try to turn on the switch. When you need to check the application, temporarily turn off the switch to view the relevant records.\n
Selinux mode can be set automatically at boot time. X-APM needs to receive boot broadcast.
This operation cannot be resumed, please confirm.

You can refine the association start control by making rules. For details, please refer to the novice manual. 

Note: The priority of the rule is greater than all other settings (for example, greening, associated startup list). 

 Tip: Turning off rule checking may save device power.
Unable to add this rule, please check the syntax

After checking, the application will be placed in the inactive state (see app-stand-by for details), otherwise the application will be forcibly stopped (force-stop).
The system will crash in sequence within 5 seconds, which will cause the device to reboot.
Developers will release the latest version, as well as other development news to push the GCM channel to the current device.
The app list shows whether the app supports GCM.

Displays a notification to help users quickly clean up and monitor cleanable apps. Note that the cleanup list and conditions are the same as the lock screen cleanup. For example, it will check if the application has notifications and whether it has opened the application without notifying the notification.。
X-APM (fake identity function) needs to read the phone information permission to work properly. Please enter the system settings to manually grant this permission or exit.
Theme, Icon pack, Recent mission card.

Help you collect GCM messages, notify you at the system level, do not need to launch the corresponding application, suitable for some applications that use GCM to wake up. \n\nBe sure to read the novice manual before using it to understand its principles and privacy protocols.
The content of the message is displayed, otherwise it will be replaced by ‘you receive a new message’.\n
Telegram messages are encrypted and do not support direct display.
For details on how to customize the ringtone, please see the help information above.
Choose whether to send notifications from the application layer or the system layer. If you choose to send notifications from the application layer, you need to start a background service.
Please receive any notification before setting up
You can control to retain certain services.
The alternative, for some custom ROMs, is managed by the listener that injects into the app. Adding or removing an app requires a full reboot of the device.
Applicable to (class) AOSP ROM, controlled by the X-APM core injected into the system framework layer. Adding or removing apps does not require a reboot.
Generate and import into the smart mode KEEP rules

I recommend solution B more than solution A. If you have problems, please file an issue.\nNote that the solution A needs to be restarted to modify the configuration. Do not simply soft-reboot.\n
When processing a smart application displayed the Toast as a reminder
Something went wrong, please quit retry:(

When it is detected that an APK will be installed, you can specify whether to allow, deny, or pop up a dialog box asking the user whether to allow the installation. Each time the dialog box is displayed for 24 seconds, the installation is rejected by default after the timeout. \n\nYou need to specify allow, ask, or reject installation requests from an application/ADB through rules, or you can set a timeout behavior. If you do not specify any rules (by default), all installations will be allowed.

Since blurring is enabled, each task snapshot needs to be processed once, which consumes some CPU and memory resources. You can enable this option on a poorly performing machine and use the cached blurred image instead of the current application snapshot. Note that this may be Let your recent task card content not appear to be updated in real time.
Power saving, Template, System application exclusion.
